mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE (room_id, sender_id, message) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT room_id AS roomId, sender_id AS senderId, message, sent_at AS sentAt FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY sent_at ASC

SELECT U.USER_ID AS userId, U.USER_NAME AS userName, UP.profile_image_url AS profileImgUrl, LM.MESSAGE AS lastMessage FROM USER_INFO U INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN USER1_ID = #{userId} THEN USER2_ID ELSE USER1_ID END AS partner_id, ROOM_ID FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE USER1_ID = #{userId} OR USER2_ID = #{userId} ) AS P ON U.USER_ID = P.partner_id LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE UP ON U.USER_ID = UP.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROOM_ID, MESSAGE, sent_at, -- [수정 1] 최종 정렬을 위해 sent_at 컬럼 추가 ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ROOM_ID ORDER BY sent_at DESC) as rn -- [수정 2] TIMESTAMP -> sent_at FROM CHAT_MESSAGE ) AS LM ON P.ROOM_ID = LM.ROOM_ID AND LM.rn = 1 ORDER BY LM.sent_at DESC, -- [수정 3] TIMESTAMP -> sent_at U.USER_NAME ASC
SELECT USER_ID AS user_id, USER_NAME AS user_name FROM USER_INFO ORDER BY USER_NAME
SELECT room_id FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE user1_id = #{user1Id} AND user2_id = #{user2Id} LIMIT 1
SELECT message_id, room_id AS roomId, sender_id AS senderId, message, sent_at AS timestamp FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE room_id = #{value} ORDER BY sent_at ASC
